alert.note: Alert for Waterville Plateau; Wenatchee Area (Washington) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Spokane (Eastern Washington and Northern Idaho)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 03 at 2:22PM PST until March 05 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Spokane
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM SATURDAY TO NOON PST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations between 2 and 5 inches. Under heavier snow bands 5 to 7 inches is possible. * WHERE...Waterville, Douglas, Chelan, Badger Mountain Road, Pangborn Airport, Cashmere, Entiat, Mansfield, and Wenatchee. * WHEN...From 6 PM Saturday to Noon PST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Snow accumulations of up to an inch an hour will be possible during the overnight and early morning hours on Sunday.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
